name: Princess Salon - star fashion
description:
Show off your style, my gorgeous girl! Choose from thousands of glamorous clothing and accessory items in addition to chic hair and makeup styles.

***Game Feature***
1. Click random box and choose dresses and accessories for the girl
2. Style princess in the best outfits
3. Hundreds of items are offered for your free combination

The saved image can be:
- emailed to your friends!
- shared on Facebook!
- used as wallpaper or avatar！
